pullrequest.title: Generate a single polyline walkway path collision

content.raw:
As I think about it, it's possible that static collisions aren't checked against each other. So there is probably only a performance impact if a dynamic object enters the bounding box of the static object. At any rate, I didn't notice an appreciable difference in the real-time factor for either world, so this issue probably isn't that big of a deal.

Boxes should probably be preferred, with extruded polylines to prevent box overlap.
content.html:
As I think about it, it's possible that static collisions aren't checked against each other. So there is probably only a performance impact if a dynamic object enters the bounding box of the static object. At any rate, I didn't notice an appreciable difference in the real-time factor for either world, so this issue probably isn't that big of a deal.

Boxes should probably be preferred, with extruded polylines to prevent box overlap.
